name: NETXP LINUX User, Group, Password Databases change
description: Rule monitors changes to user, group, and password databases, providing visibility into modifications that may impact user authentication.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "*etcgroup*" or auditd.log.key: "*etcpasswd*"  or auditd.log.key: "*opasswd*" 
any where event.module: "auditd"
